itunes:title: #51: Make the Decision to Start (Student Highlight)
title: #51: Make the Decision to Start (Student Highlight)
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Sometimes the hardest decision is to start... especially if everything looks like it is going well.  In this episode, we look at how this showed up for one of my students in hopes it will help inspire you to get started as well.  MENTIONED...
itunes:summary:
Sometimes the hardest decision is to start... especially if everything looks like it is going well. 

In this episode, we look at how this showed up for one of my students in hopes it will help inspire you to get started as well.
